verses.name: Numbers 31:37
verses.text: And the Lord’s tribute of the sheep was six hundred and threescore and fifteen.

verses.name: Numbers 31:38
verses.text: And the beeves were thirty and six thousand; of which the Lord’s tribute was threescore and twelve.

verses.name: Numbers 31:39
verses.text: And the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred; of which the Lord’s tribute was threescore and one.

verses.name: Numbers 31:40
verses.text: And the persons were sixteen thousand; of which the Lord’s tribute was thirty and two persons.

verses.name: Numbers 31:41
verses.text: And Moses gave the tribute, which was the Lord’s heave offering, unto Eleazar the priest, as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Numbers 31:42
verses.text: And of the children of Israel’s half, which Moses divided from the men that warred,
